sql.if: and keyword in (select keyword from keyword_data where user_idx = (select user_idx from user_data where user_name = #{company} and keyword_property = '포함' ) )
and keyword in (select keyword from keyword_data where keyword_main = #{selectKey})
and keyword in (select keyword from keyword_data where user_idx = (select user_idx from user_data where user_name = #{company} and keyword_property = '포함' ) )
and keyword in (select keyword from keyword_data where keyword_main = #{selectKey})
where keyword in (select keyword from keyword_data where user_idx = (select user_idx from user_data where user_name = #{company} and keyword_property = '포함' ) )
and keyword in (select keyword from keyword_data where keyword_main = #{selectKey})

mapper.insert: insert into portal_data(portal_type, portal_name, writer, portal_title, portal_content, deviceType, writeDate, keyword, keyword_type, url, textType, thumbnail) values (#{portal_type}, #{portal_name}, #{writer}, #{portal_title}, #{portal_content}, #{deviceType}, #{writeDate}, #{keyword}, #{keyword_type}, #{url}, #{textType}, #{thumbnail})
mapper.select: select * from portal_data where portal_idx = #{portal_idx}
mapper.update: update portal_data set portal_type = #{portal_type}, portal_name = #{portal_name}, portal_title = #{portal_title}, deviceType = #{deviceType}, writeDate = #{writeDate}, keyword = #{keyword}, keyword_type = #{keyword_type}, url = #{url}, updateDate = now() where portal_idx = #{portal_idx}
mapper.select: select count(*) from portal_data where portal_name = 'naver' and keyword_type = '영화'
select count(*) from portal_data where portal_name = 'naver' and keyword_type = '배우'

select * from portal_data where url is not null
order by updateDate desc limit #{startPage}, #{perPageNum}

select * from portal_data_history where url is not null
order by updateDate desc limit #{startPage}, #{perPageNum}

select * from portal_data where url is not null
order by updateDate desc
select count(*) from portal_data where url is not null
select count(*) from portal_data_history where url is not null
select count(*) from portal_data where createDate between date_add(#{date}, interval -1 hour) and #{date}

select count(*) from portal_data where keyword in (select keyword from keyword_data where user_idx = any(select user_idx from user_data where user_name = '쇼박스') ) and createDate between date_add(#{date}, interval -1 hour) and #{date}

select count(if(portal_name = 'naver', portal_name, null)) type1, count(if(portal_name = 'daum', portal_name, null)) type2, count(*) type3 from portal_data where portal_type = #{type} and date_add(now(), interval -1 day) < writeDate and writeDate < now()

select count(if(portal_name = 'naver', portal_name, null)) type1, count(if(portal_name = 'daum', portal_name, null)) type2, count(*) type3 from portal_data where portal_type = #{type} and keyword in (select keyword from keyword_data where user_idx = any(select user_idx from user_data where user_name = '쇼박스') ) and date_add(now(), interval -1 day) < writeDate and writeDate < now()

select count(if(writeDate < date_add(now(), interval -1 day), writeDate, null)) type1, count(if(writeDate > date_add(now(), interval -1 day), writeDate, null)) type2 from portal_data where writeDate between date_add(now(), interval -2 day) and date_add(now(), interval -0 day)

select count(if(writeDate < date_add(now(), interval -1 day), writeDate, null)) type1, count(if(writeDate > date_add(now(), interval -1 day), writeDate, null)) type2 from portal_data where keyword in (select keyword from keyword_data where user_idx = any(select user_idx from user_data where user_name = '쇼박스') ) and writeDate between date_add(now(), interval -2 day) and date_add(now(), interval -0 day)

select * from portal_data where textType is not null and portal_name = 'naver'
order by createdate desc limit #{startPage}, #{perPageNum}
select count(*) from portal_data where textType is not null and score is null and texttype!='삭제글' and portal_name = 'naver'

select count(if(textType='좋은글', textType, null)) lik, count(if(textType='나쁜글', textType, null)) dis, count(if(textType='관심글', textType, null)) cu, count(if(textType='기타글', textType, null)) etc, count(if(textType is not null and texttype!='삭제글', textType, null)) al from portal_data where textType is not null and score is null

select DATE_FORMAT(writeDate,'%Y-%m-%d') writeDate, count(if(textType='좋은글', textType, null)) lik, count(if(textType='나쁜글', textType, null)) dis, count(if(textType='관심글', textType, null)) cu, count(if(textType='기타글', textType, null)) etc, count(if(textType is not null and texttype!='삭제글', textType, null)) al from portal_data where textType is not null
group by DATE_FORMAT(writeDate,'%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY writeDate desc;

select count(if(textType='좋은글', textType, null)) lik, count(if(textType='나쁜글', textType, null)) dis, count(if(textType='관심글', textType, null)) cu, count(if(textType='기타글', textType, null)) etc, count(if(textType is not null and texttype!='삭제글', textType, null)) from union.portal_data where portal_type = 'blog'

select count(if(textType='좋은글', textType, null)) lik, count(if(textType='나쁜글', textType, null)) dis, count(if(textType='관심글', textType, null)) cu, count(if(textType='기타글', textType, null)) etc, count(if(textType is not null and texttype!='삭제글', textType, null)) from union.portal_data where portal_type = 'cafe'

select count(if(textType='좋은글', textType, null)) lik, count(if(textType='나쁜글', textType, null)) dis, count(if(textType='관심글', textType, null)) cu, count(if(textType='기타글', textType, null)) etc, count(if(textType is not null and texttype!='삭제글', textType, null)) from union.portal_data where portal_name = 'naver' and portal_type = 'blog'

select count(if(textType='좋은글', textType, null)) lik, count(if(textType='나쁜글', textType, null)) dis, count(if(textType='관심글', textType, null)) cu, count(if(textType='기타글', textType, null)) etc, count(if(textType is not null and texttype!='삭제글', textType, null)) from union.portal_data where portal_name = 'naver' and portal_type = 'cafe'

select count(if(textType='좋은글', textType, null)) lik, count(if(textType='나쁜글', textType, null)) dis, count(if(textType='관심글', textType, null)) cu, count(if(textType='기타글', textType, null)) etc, count(if(textType is not null and texttype!='삭제글', textType, null)) from union.portal_data where portal_name = 'naver' and portal_type = 'kintip'

select count(if(textType='좋은글', textType, null)) lik, count(if(textType='나쁜글', textType, null)) dis, count(if(textType='관심글', textType, null)) cu, count(if(textType='기타글', textType, null)) etc, count(if(textType is not null and texttype!='삭제글', textType, null)) from union.portal_data where portal_name = 'naver' and portal_type = 'webdoc'

select count(if(textType='좋은글', textType, null)) lik, count(if(textType='나쁜글', textType, null)) dis, count(if(textType='관심글', textType, null)) cu, count(if(textType='기타글', textType, null)) etc, count(if(textType is not null and texttype!='삭제글', textType, null)) from union.portal_data where portal_name = 'daum' and portal_type = 'blog'

select count(if(textType='좋은글', textType, null)) lik, count(if(textType='나쁜글', textType, null)) dis, count(if(textType='관심글', textType, null)) cu, count(if(textType='기타글', textType, null)) etc, count(if(textType is not null and texttype!='삭제글', textType, null)) from union.portal_data where portal_name = 'daum' and portal_type = 'cafe'

select count(if(textType='좋은글', textType, null)) lik, count(if(textType='나쁜글', textType, null)) dis, count(if(textType='관심글', textType, null)) cu, count(if(textType='기타글', textType, null)) etc, count(if(textType is not null and texttype!='삭제글', textType, null)) from union.portal_data where portal_name = 'daum' and portal_type = 'kintip'

select count(if(textType='좋은글', textType, null)) lik, count(if(textType='나쁜글', textType, null)) dis, count(if(textType='관심글', textType, null)) cu, count(if(textType='기타글', textType, null)) etc, count(if(textType is not null and texttype!='삭제글', textType, null)) from union.portal_data where portal_name = 'daum' and portal_type = 'webdoc'

select * from portal_data where textType is not null and portal_name = 'daum'
order by createdate desc limit #{startPage}, #{perPageNum}
select count(*) from portal_data where textType is not null and score is null and texttype!='삭제글' and portal_name = 'daum'

select * from portal_data where textType is null
order by createDate desc limit #{startPage}, #{perPageNum}
select count(*) from portal_data where textType is null

select * from portal_data where textType is not null and score is null
order by createdate desc limit #{startPage}, #{perPageNum}

select * from portal_data where textType is not null and score is null and textType!='삭제글'
order by updateDate desc limit #{startPage}, #{perPageNum}

select * from portal_data where portal_type = 'score'
order by updateDate desc limit #{startPage}, #{perPageNum}

select * from portal_data where portal_type = 'score'
order by updateDate desc
select count(*) from portal_data where portal_type = 'score'

select count(if(textType='좋은글', textType, null)) lik, count(if(textType='나쁜글', textType, null)) dis, count(if(textType='관심글', textType, null)) cu, count(if(textType='악성글', textType, null)) etc, count(if(textType is not null and texttype!='삭제글', textType, null)) al from portal_data where portal_type = 'score'
select score from portal_data where score is not null
select * from portal_data where textType is not null and score is null
mapper.update: update portal_data set textType = #{textType}, updateDate = now() where portal_idx = #{portal_idx}
mapper.select: select count(*) from portal_data where textType is not null and score is null
select count(*) from portal_data where textType is not null and score is null

select * from portal_data where textType is not null and score is null
order by writeDate desc

select DATE_FORMAT(writeDate,'%Y-%m-%d') writeDate, portal_title, url, max(view_cnt)as view_cnt, max(like_cnt)as like_cnt, max(reply_cnt)as reply_cnt,count(*) as total from naver_videos where url is not null
group by portal_title order by writeDate desc limit #{startPage}, #{perPageNum}

select count(*) as total from( select DATE_FORMAT(writeDate,'%Y-%m-%d') writeDate, portal_title from naver_videos where url is not null
group by portal_title) as total;

select DATE_FORMAT(createDate,'%Y-%m-%d') createDate, portal_title, url, max(view_cnt)as view_cnt, max(like_cnt)as like_cnt, max(reply_cnt)as reply_cnt,count(*) as total from naver_videos where url = #{url}
group by DATE_FORMAT(createDate,'%Y-%m-%d') order by createDate desc

select * from naver_videos where url = #{url}
order by createDate desc

select count(*) as total from( select DATE_FORMAT(createDate,'%Y-%m-%d') createDate, portal_title, url, max(view_cnt)as view_cnt, max(like_cnt)as like_cnt, max(reply_cnt)as reply_cnt,count(*) as total from naver_videos where url = #{url}
group by DATE_FORMAT(createDate,'%Y-%m-%d') order by createDate desc) as total;
select * from naver_videos where url = #{url} and createDate >= #{createstartDate} and createDate <= #{createendDate} order by createDate desc
select count(*) from naver_videos where url = #{url} and createDate >= #{createstartDate} and createDate <= #{createendDate} order by createDate desc

select f.view_cnt as view_cnt from (select (b.view_cnt-a.view_cnt) as view_cnt from (select @RNUM:=@RNUM+1 AS ROWNUM, view_cnt from (SELECT @RNUM:=0) R,(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(view_cnt), 0)as view_cnt FROM naver_videos WHERE view_cnt !=1 and url = #{url} and createDate between date_add(#{date}, interval -1 hour) and #{date} order by createDate desc limit 1)c) a, (select @RNUM1:=@RNUM1+1 AS ROWNUM, view_cnt from (SELECT @RNUM1:=0) R,(select * from naver_videos where url = #{url} and createDate >= #{date} order by createDate asc limit 1)d) b where a.rownum = b.rownum) f;

select f.reply_cnt as reply_cnt from (select (b.reply_cnt-a.reply_cnt) as reply_cnt from (select @RNUM:=@RNUM+1 AS ROWNUM, reply_cnt from (SELECT @RNUM:=0) R,(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(reply_cnt), 0)as reply_cnt FROM naver_videos WHERE reply_cnt !=1 and url = #{url} and createDate between date_add(#{date}, interval -1 hour) and #{date} order by createDate desc limit 1)c) a, (select @RNUM1:=@RNUM1+1 AS ROWNUM, reply_cnt from (SELECT @RNUM1:=0) R,(select * from naver_videos where url = #{url} and createDate >= #{date} order by createDate asc limit 1)d) b where a.rownum = b.rownum) f;

select f.like_cnt as like_cnt from (select (b.like_cnt-a.like_cnt) as like_cnt from (select @RNUM:=@RNUM+1 AS ROWNUM, like_cnt from (SELECT @RNUM:=0) R,(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(like_cnt), 0)as like_cnt FROM naver_videos WHERE like_cnt !=1 and url = #{url} and createDate between date_add(#{date}, interval -1 hour) and #{date} order by createDate desc limit 1)c) a, (select @RNUM1:=@RNUM1+1 AS ROWNUM, like_cnt from (SELECT @RNUM1:=0) R,(select * from naver_videos where url = #{url} and createDate >= #{date} order by createDate asc limit 1)d) b where a.rownum = b.rownum) f;

select view_cnt from naver_videos where view_cnt != (select view_cnt from naver_videos where url=#{url} and createDate >= #{createstartDate} and createDate <= #{createendDate} order by createDate desc limit 1) and url = #{url} and createDate >= #{createstartDate} and createDate <= #{createendDate} order by createDate desc
select * from naver_videos where url = #{url} order by createDate asc limit 1
select * from naver_videos where url = #{url} and createDate >= #{createstartDate} and createDate <= #{createendDate} order by createDate asc limit 1
